ğŸ›¡ï¸ Privacy first. All data will only be stored in your profile or local storage. Nothing will be collected from you or shared with third parties, and in fact, there is no server at all. Besides, of course, no tracking or ads.

ğŸ”° A 7-day free trial is already included in the premium. There is also a 3-day free trial without payment info as a special offer for a limited time now.

ğŸ”¥ Developed in pure JavaScript from scratch, with no frameworks or libraries, lightweight, aiming for ultra performance as much as possible.

ğŸ’¡ Require Chrome 120 or above. Behaviors in other versions or browsers are not guaranteed.

ğŸ’¡ Activation synced through your profile will only be counted as the same single one and could be reused again at any time after deactivation.

ğŸš§ The side panel is limited to a minimum width of 360px by Chrome. It may look a bit wide on small screens. Unfortunately, there is nothing we can do until Chrome removes this restriction.

ğŸš§ Saved Tab Group is a new feature of Chrome. However, in the meantime, API does not fully support saved tab groups. Partial operations may not work with saved tab groups.

ğŸš§ Multi-language support is planned, but not with high priority in the current stage. Mainly focus on the English version first.
